mods.abstract: Photograph showing Audubon Sugar School. The large building on left was the residence of the Director of the LSU Audubon Sugar Experiment Station. The laboratory building shown on the right. Located in Audubon Park, New Orleans.
mods.note: Additional photographs of the Audubon Sugar School may be found digitized in the LDL within the LSU Photograph Collection. Retrieved August 4, 2014, fromhttp://cdm16313.contentdm.oclc.org/cdm/compoundobject/collection/LSU_UAP/id/2857/rec/28; http://cdm16313.contentdm.oclc.org/cdm/compoundobject/collection/LSU_UAP/id/3099/rec/38; http://cdm16313.contentdm.oclc.org/cdm/search/collection/LSU_UAP/searchterm/audubon%20sugar%20school/field/all/mode/any/conn/and/order/nosort/ad/asc/cosuppress/1
